title: How to stop reading called ID/name over Bluetooth headset
content: When I get calls, my Bluetooth headset reads the caller name from my contacts, or the caller ID.  I hate that, and I want it to just ring, or something.  It's really pissing me off.  There has to be a setting, or a privacy setting somewhere, I can't believe it's impossible to block the phone from sending private information over Bluetooth like that...
